edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.ichrom

Class IntegerChromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.doane.dugal.dea.Individual
      • edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.ichrom.IntegerChromosome

  • public class IntegerChromosome
extends Individual
    Class representing a fixed-length chromosome of integers.
    Version:
    12/30/2014
    Author:
    Mark M. Meysenburg

    • Constructor Detail

      • IntegerChromosome

        public IntegerChromosome()
        Default constructor. Create a shell of an IntegerChromosome.

      • IntegerChromosome

        public IntegerChromosome(int length,
                         int lo,
                         int hi)
        Initializing constructor. Create a new IntegerChromosome of the specified length, with each gene randomly initialized to be in the range [lo, hi].
        Parameters:
        length - Number of integers in the chromosome.
        lo - Low end of legal range of gene values in the chromosome.
        hi - High end of legal range of gene values in the chromosome.

      • IntegerChromosome

        public IntegerChromosome(IntegerChromosome ind)
        Copy constructor. Make this IntegerChromosome deep-copy identical to the parameter.
        Parameters:
        ind - IntegerChromosome object to mimic

    • Method Detail

      • randomizeGene

        public final void randomizeGene(int gene)
        Randomly initialize one of the genes in the chromosome to be in the range [lo, hi].
        Parameters:
        gene - Which gene in the chromosome to randomize.

      • getGene

        public int getGene(int gene)
        Get the value of one gene in the chromosome.
        Parameters:
        gene - Which gene to get.
        Returns:
        value of the specified gene.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
